title: No North East Line Service due to Power Fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 因电力故障，东北线停止服务
title_translations.ms: Tiada Perkhidmatan Laluan Timur Laut kerana Kerosakan Kuasa
title_translations.ta: மின்சாரக் கோளாறு காரணமாக வடகிழக்கு ரயில் சேவை இல்லை

updates.text: 26/10, 9.15am: NEL svcs in both directions available. Addn travelling time of 5 mins. Free bus rides & shuttle bus svcs still available.
26/10, 8.39am: NEL svcs in both directions available. Free bus svcs are available islandwide. Please approach our staff if u need assistance
26/10, 8.25am: NEL svcs in both directions available. Addn travelling time of 10 mins. Free bus rides & shuttle bus svcs still available.
26/10, 8.11am: NEL svcs in both directions available. Free bus services are available islandwide.
26/10, 7.55am: NEL svcs in both directions now available. Addn travelling time of 10 mins. Free bus rides & shuttle bus svcs still available
26/10, 7.47am: NEL svcs in both directions now available. Please approach our staff if you need assistance.
26/10, 7.28am: NEL svcs in both directions now available. Addn travelling time of 20 mins. Free bus rides & shuttle bus svcs still available
26/10, 7.05: NEL svc in the direction from Punggol NE17 to HarbourFront NE1 is now available.
26/10, 6.51am: NEL svc in the direction from Sengkang NE16 to HarbourFront NE1 is now available.
26/10, 6.46am: No NEL svc due to a power fault. Free bus rides & Shuttle Bus svc available at designated bus stops along NEL.
